en: The dense forest exudes a pleasant aroma.
pinyin: Shī shī de shùlín sànfā zhe lìngrén yújué de qìxī.

en: Study hard while you’re young so you don't waste your energy.
pinyin: hǎo hǎo xuéxí cái bù wǎng niánshào mǎo jìn er!

en: The river flows under the starry sky like the Milky Way.
pinyin: Hǎoxiàng yínhàn yībān de héliú zài xīngkōng xià liútǎng zhe.

en: This is a unique moment in our lives, when our destinies converge at one end of the Milky Way.
pinyin: Zhè shì wǒmen yīshēng zhōng qítè de shíkè, wǒmen de mìngyùn huìhé zài yínhàn de nà yīduān.

en: The reflection of the Milky Way glimmers on the lake, sparkling in the clear night sky.
pinyin: Yínhàn dàoyǐng zài húshuǐ zhōng, zài qínglǎng de yèkōng lǐ bōguānglínlin.

en: Curiosity suddenly peaked.
pinyin: Hǎoqíxīn yīxiàzǐ yǒng dàole zhuī jiān.

en: He pulled and pushed with all his might until the door yielded, as if it was pried open by a spike.
pinyin: Tā jí jìn suǒ néng, shǐ jìn yòng lì, zhuī jiān yīyàng qiào kāi le mén.

en: His decision left the actor in a precarious position, like being on the tip of a needle in a storm.
pinyin: Tā de juézé shǐ yǎnyuán de chǔjìng chù zài le bàofēngyǔ bān de zhuījiān zhī xià.

en: My heart is filled with joy and pleasure when my good friends praise me.
pinyin: Hǎoyǒu kǒuzhōng jìn shì zànměi, wǒ xīnzhōng jǐnxiù bù yǐ.

en: My grandmother's embroidery skill is excellent, and her words of praise are well-deserved.
pinyin: Nǎinai de xiùhuā jìyì fēicháng gāochāo, jǐn xīn xiù kǒu shì dāng zhī wú kuì de.

en: — We need to do a good job of preventing terrorist attacks to ensure social stability.
pinyin: wǒmen yào zuòhǎo fángtè gōngzuò cái néng quèbǎo shèhuì de āndìng.

en: — The design of this building took into account measures to prevent terrorist attacks.
pinyin: zhè zuò jiànzhú wù de shèjì kǎolǜ le fángtè wèntí.

en: — You need to learn some basic knowledge of preventing terrorist attacks, in order to protect yourself and other people's safety.
pinyin: nǐ xūyào xuéxí yīxiē jīběn de fángtè zhīshì, yǐ bǎohù zìjǐ hé tārén de ānquán.

en: Crossing the boundary line is not allowed.
pinyin: yuè guò xiàn jiè xiàn shì bù bèi yǔn xǔ de.

en: Please do not attempt to break through the boundary line.
pinyin: qǐng bù yào shì tú tū pò xiàn jiè xiàn.

en: The war has once again advanced the geopolitical boundary lines.
pinyin: zhàn zhēng zài cì tuī jìn le dì yuán zhèng zhì shàng de xiàn jiè xiàn.

en: Many years ago, the new brides in our village used to carry a large bundle of their dowry on their back.
pinyin: hǎo duō nián qián, wǒ men cūn ér lǐ de xīn xífu dōu yào bēi zhe yí ge dà bāo fu, lǐ miàn zhuāng zhuó zì jǐ de péi lián.

en: In the past, dowry used to include a set of personal belongings for the bride but it is becoming less common nowadays.
pinyin: péi lián běn lái shì nǚ hái zi jià zhuāng lǐ de yí zhǒng, bú guò xiàn zài yuè lái yuè shǎo le.

en: As a new bride, she brought with her a lot of dowry, including gold and silver jewelry and some antique calligraphy and paintings.
pinyin: tā xīn jià fù dài le bù shǎo péi lián, bāo kuò le jīn yín shǒu shì hé yì xiē gǔ wàn zì huà.

en: Many years ago, we used to watch movies in the open-air cinema.
pinyin: Hǎo duō nián qián, wǒmen hái zài lùtiān dà xìyuàn kàn diànyǐng.,

en: Open-air cinemas are rare these days.
pinyin: Lùtiān dà xìyuàn xiànzài yǐjīng hěn shǎo jiàn le.,

en: Last weekend, I went to an open-air cinema to watch a movie.
pinyin: Shàng gè zhōumò, wǒ qùle lùtiān dà xìyuàn kàn diànyǐng.,

en: After listening to the teacher's explanation, he felt enlightened.
pinyin: Tā tīng wán lǎoshī de jiǎngjiě hòu, gǎnjué língxǐng le.

en: When I'm doing the daily report, I often need a cup of coffee to keep myself alert.
pinyin: Zuò rìbào de shíhou, wǒ chángcháng xūyào yībēi kāfēi lái ràng zìjǐ língxǐng yīxià.

en: In the quiet of the night, he often has some inspired ideas.
pinyin: Zài yè shēn rén jìng de shíhou, tā chángcháng huì yǒu yīxiē língxǐng de xiǎngfǎ.

en: These shoes are made of high-quality tanned leather.
pinyin: zhè shuāng xié cǎi yòng gāo jí róu zhì pí gé zhì zuò ér chéng.

en: Tannins can help extend the life of animal leather.
pinyin: róu zhì kě yǐ bāng zhù yán cháng dòng wù pí gé de shòu mìng.

en: This plant contains abundant tannins, which can be used to make dyes and medicines.
pinyin: zhè zhǒng zhí wù hán yǒu fēng fù de róu zhì, kě yǐ yòng lái zhì zuò rǎn liào hé yào wù.

en: Life is full of ups and downs.
pinyin: shēnghuó chōngmǎn le dùncuò yìyáng

en: The melody of this song is full of ebb and flow.
pinyin: zhè shǒu gē de xuánlǜ chōngmǎn le dùncuò yìyáng

en: The author uses the conflicts in the novel to achieve a vivid ebb and flow effect.
pinyin: zuòzhě jièzhù xiǎoshuō zhōng máodùn chōngtú lái dádào xiānmíng de dùncuò yìyáng xiàoguǒ

en: it seems like the soul of Qin Shi Huang has not been put to rest by any exorcist.
pinyin: hǎoxiàng qínshǐhuáng de yīnhún yīzhí méiyǒu bèi qūmó gǎnguǐ de dàoshì gěi jiějué diào

en: it is said that if a village has bad feng shui, the villagers need to invite an exorcist to drive out all the ghosts.
pinyin: chuánshuō rúguǒ yīgè cūnzhuàng lǐ de fēngshuǐ bù hǎo, jiù xūyào qǐng dàoshì jiāng cūn lǐ suǒyǒu de guǐ gǎnchūqù

en: after the sacrificial activities are over, this temple will hold a ceremony to exorcise and drive away evil spirits.
pinyin: jìsì huódòng jiéshù hòu, zhège sìmiào huì jǔxíng qūmó gǎnguǐ de yíshì

en: My mother's cooking is delicious, and she adds a lot of green onions.
pinyin: Wǒ de māmā zuòfàn hěn hǎochī, lǐmiàn jiāle hěn duō cōnghuā.
